content: **knitted shawl in drops babymerino the piece is worked sideways with garter stitch and i-cord ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern bm-118 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **measurements** height in middle = approx 11 to 12 cm width along top = approx 108 cm **yarn** drops baby merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 11 ice blue **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 48 row in height with garter stitch on needle size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
